snippet: The settlement with the Securities and Exchange Commission comes more than seven years after the two hedge funds collapsed, saddling investors with billions of dollars in losses.
abstract: Citigroup agrees to pay $180 million to settle Securities and Exchange Commission charges that it concealed problems at two now-defunct hedge funds from investors.
lead_paragraph: The settlement with the Securities and Exchange Commission comes more than seven years after the two hedge funds collapsed, saddling investors with billions of dollars in losses.

headline.main: Citigroup to Pay $180 Million Over Collapsed Hedge Funds
